entry: Long: Price crosses above 9-period EMA and RSI < 30; Short: Price crosses below 9-period EMA and RSI > 70
exit: Long: Price crosses below 9-period EMA; Short: Price crosses above 9-period EMA;  Alternative: Trailing Stop Loss
stop_loss: Fixed percentage or price level below/above entry price
take_profit: Fixed percentage or price level above/below entry price
